text: Finehasi mwanage Eleazali, Eleazali mwanage Haluni, ayo kakala yosang'hana kuulongozi wa disanduku. Waizilaeli wamuuza Mndewa Imulungu, “Vino tuchole kabili tukaitowe na ndugu zetu, iwanhu wa kabila da Benjamini hebu sikutuchole?” Mndewa Imulungu kalonga, “Choleni, mayo nowagela mmakono genu.”
